segments.text: I notice the boy stretching to reach the cookie jar, standing on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He seems so determined to get those cookies, no matter the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit worried for him; that stool looks like it could tip over any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting patiently for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at her expectant face, so innocent and hopeful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely oblivious to the scene behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what she would do if she turned around and saw them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still overflowing, and she hasn't even noticed her feet are wet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit frustrated watching this scene unfold without anyone doing anything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm and tidy, unlike the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
